content:
What are some classic romantic movies that you can feature on an HTML page? Here's an example of HTML code to display a list of romantic movies:
  • Gone with the Wind
  • Casablanca
  • Roman Holiday
  • When Harry Met Sally
  • The Notebook
Feel free to add more movies to the list!

Sure! Here are some additional classic romantic movies that you can include in your HTML list: ```html
  • Gone with the Wind
  • Casablanca
  • Roman Holiday
  • When Harry Met Sally
  • The Notebook
  • Breakfast at Tiffany's
  • Pride and Prejudice
  • Pretty Woman
  • Titanic
  • An Affair to Remember
  • Notting Hill
  • La La Land
  • Amélie
  • Dirty Dancing
  • Love Actually
``` These movies span different eras and styles, offering a wide variety of romantic storytelling to feature on your page!
